about_the_game:
1001. Jigsaw is the perfect gift for fans of classic jigsaws! It’s dedicated to our incredible planet Earth! Take a fresh look at our amazing and unique world. Amazing plants, mysterious underwater world, colorful birds, animals from different continents, picturesque landscapes, gifts of nature - a lot of themed puzzles awaits you. Set off on a magical tour spanning the globe. Discover the secrets and mysteries of the world's most diverse cultures, take a boat trip on incredible mountain lakes, travel from the cold places of Northern Europe to the tropical lands of Africa, and stroll through majestic eastern temples! All this awaits you in 1001 Jigsaw: Earth Chronicles 9. Explore our planet without leaving home!

Set a difficulty level to suit you in each jigsaw: number of pieces, spinning, and deformation. Save your progress at any time! Convenient controls with a multitude of hints and tools help make the gameplay more comfortable. Make the game more exciting by completing special quests to earn trophies!

- High quality unique images
- Well designed game-play: useful hints, sort tool and magnifying glass.
- Optional game difficulty control makes your gameplay infinite
- Custom styles of pieces with rotation
- Save game progress and continue to collect the puzzle at any time
- Tasks and colorful trophies for those who love excitement
- Pleasant and relaxing music
- Get a lot of puzzles for one purchase. It is beneficial!

name: 1001 Jigsaw. Earth Chronicles 9

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3 or later
  • Processor: 1500 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 145 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 145 MB available space

short_description: Set of photos of our fantastic planet! Discover the breathtaking beauty of our world alongside 1001 Jigsaw: Earth Chronicles 9!
